user.title: Climate Sync Setup
user.description: Configure synchronization between two climate entities. The source entity (e.g., Nest) will control the target entity (e.g., Kumo Cloud).

data.enable_boost_mode: Enable Boost Mode (max fan/extreme temp when actively heating/cooling)

data_description.source_climate: The climate entity that will control the target (e.g., your Nest thermostat)
data_description.target_climate: The climate entity to be controlled (e.g., your Kumo Cloud unit)
data_description.enable_temp_offset: Adjusts target setpoint based on temperature difference between source and target sensors
data_description.enable_boost_mode: When source is actively heating/cooling, sets target to max fan speed and extreme temperature
data_description.offset_sensitivity: How aggressively to compensate for temperature differences (1.0 = 1:1, higher = more aggressive)
data_description.sync_interval: How often to check and re-sync (in minutes) to ensure target stays in sync

error.same_climate: Source and target climate entities must be different

abort.already_configured: This climate sync pair is already configured
